title: Danco 10307 Universal Tube and Flange Assembly, Chrome
features: Covers the working mechanism of a faucet
Escutcheon: 3/4 in. height, 1-1/4 in. I.D. x 3 in. O.D.
Flange: 3 in. height x 1-1/2 in. width x 1-1/2 in. depth
Includes 4-adapters that fit most faucet stems
Adapters I.D. widths range from 1-1/2 in. to 3/4 in.
description: Universal replacement escutcheon. Works with American standard, central Brass, crane, Gerber, Harcraft, Indiana brass, moment, price pfister's, Sayco, Sterling, Steamway, union brass, and Kohler. Tube is threaded on both ends and includes adapters. Updated style flange. Replaces most existing OEM (original equipment manufacturer) style tube and flange.

Danco is one of the largest plumbing repair, replacement and remodel suppliers in the home improvement industry.  We are largely focused on empowering Do It Yourself consumers with affordable plumbing products and solutions which create new and refreshing décors for bathrooms and kitchens.
